text: Name: lillian lillian

Development is being done using agile methodology with daily scrums, and continuous integration, to deliver higher-quality software far more rapidly.

Involved in Agile process, weekly Sprints, weekly workshops, demo’s, reviews, retro’s and daily Scrums to discuss the development of the application.
Extended CSS as needed to accommodate new data and display types.
